attributes.action: 'explain (this is in fact a verb and therefore actually requests action) to the people why his "Vision for Britain" remains unclear after two years in office.'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Please read the terms and conditions of the Petitions site: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms

"We cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognize" or "acknowledge" something, as they do not clearly call for a recognizable action." 

The word "explain" falls under the same category.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
